title: When the top laners are in a close duel, and you are waiting with Soraka to ult at the perfect time

replies.body: Then you TP on bot lane and cut her head off before heading back top to fight an honorable battle.
{{champion:19}} "Bring her heart on the way back, would ya bro?"

Warwick can't kill Soraka. She will just ult like:
http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ojLkUsfOOYs/VSJdhCQj5MI/AAAAAAAAS0A/tKaIKxSxGqA/s1600/nothing-stops-this-train.gif
ult while getting instagibbed by his ult? naw.
I usually have enough health from items to survive, and resistances later in the game. Waste of ult usually.
http://www.reactiongifs.us/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/good_luck_morgan_freeman.gif

And do it casually in a time manner of 30 seconds.
{{champion:98}} {{summoner:12}} "Target marked."

Then you remember you're Darius and Riot gave you a heal for some ungodly reason:

https://45.media.tumblr.com/cfd3fb525ad8b45afe023966c490ebfb/tumblr_nncwnpWoV61tifi3io1_500.gif

Dunkmaser Darius dunks who he pleases.
https://49.media.tumblr.com/94995c7459591ecd02b89ccd63523847/tumblr_o22mbxt9rJ1v1ncd6o1_500.gif

not _everyone_

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/E-VfB1HoSv4/hqdefault.jpg
http://i1225.photobucket.com/albums/ee399/CherrySueDointheDo/98728-that-goes-without-saying-gif-g-he7c_zps04e47f30.gif
And that's one of the reasons Soraka is despised.

Soraka is awesome and you know it.
http://orig10.deviantart.net/87cf/f/2015/315/b/0/lol__soraka__yandere__by_lynashi-d9gbylv.gif
Yes...just yes
But their {{champion:30}} ults and negates the heal entirely.

Since when does Karthus negate Soraka's ult during laning phase?

All he does is simply rip out the souls of his enemies.

one day a karthus main will shit on your parade- they do exist.

And Karthus' ult does more damage than Soraka's heal. ALTHOUGH it will still probably make that person survive it anyways- as at lvl 1 his ult does 250. Soraka does 150 last I checked- so unless you're pretty screwed and walking away with 17 health you can pop a few biscuits and a middle finger and call it good.
Are you taking windspeakers and ap from spelltheif's item line and runes? Ardent Censor also messes with the math.
Praise the stars
http://i.imgur.com/MWr84hp.jpg
But sometimes heresy can be good...
